segments.text: Looking at this scene, the woman's concentration on the plate is admirable.

segments.text: She stands in it unknowingly, her apron dampening.

segments.text: The children by the cabinet are so innocent in their play.

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware they all are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment feels fragile, like it could break any second.
